name: previewhub-github-image-preview
description: 在GitHub页面直接预览README.md中的图片，支持弹窗浏览和导航，兼容github.dev编辑器

scripts.build: echo 'Building PreviewHub extension...' && echo 'No build process needed for this extension.'
scripts.test: echo 'Testing PreviewHub extension...' && echo 'Please test manually by loading the extension in Chrome.'
scripts.lint: echo 'Linting PreviewHub extension...' && echo 'Please use your IDE linter or Chrome extension validation.'
scripts.pack: echo 'Packing extension for distribution...' && zip -r previewhub-extension.zip . -x '*.git*' 'node_modules/*' 'package*.json' '*.md' 'icons/create*' 'icons/generate*'
